title: Sale of donated food, prohibited; fines
context: [ยง145D-3] Sale of donated food, prohibited; fines. (a) No person or organization shall sell, or offer for sale, any food product donated or distributed under this chapter. (b) Any violation of this section is punishable by a fine not to exceed $1,000. [L 1982, c 260, pt of ยง2]
